data.description: Diary books are personal accounts written in a journal format, providing intimate insights into the thoughts, emotions, and experiences of the author.

data.description: Dark Fantasy is a subgenre of fantasy that incorporates elements of horror, featuring dark and often disturbing themes, settings, and characters.
